title: Malz glitch
body: when malz starts to re call with the snow day skin the poro loses its texture it just becomes blue like if the coding messed up i would put pictures of it but for some  reason will not let

replies.body: FYI - Press F12 to take screenshots in game. They save to a Screenshots folder within the Riot Games folder.

Hiya Metalax! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are looking into it.

I've had this happen before too! I recalled and was REALLY surprised by it! I was like: WTF?! Does anyone else see this?! The {{champion:432}} on my team saw it too and was surprised as well. I mean its hard not to see it when I recall next to him.
